QuestData.Title: The Culler Cometh
QuestData.Description: Near the southern end of this bluff is where you will find the treacherous leader of the caribou trappers. She is a savage like no other, making a mockery out of the carcasses of the slain animals: drinking from their blood and howling to the moons!$B$BFind this murderer, Karen, and end her worthless existence.$B$BPrepare yourself properly, $n. Karen the Culler has indulged in the riches that Nesingwary has lavished upon her!
QuestData.LogDescription: Zaza at the D.E.H.T.A. Encampment in the Borean Tundra wants you to kill Karen the Culler.
QuestData.RewardText: Perhaps her death will serve as an example to others that dare slay animals for sport and riches.
